title: Relating to Lease of State Land in West Oʻahu for Educational Facilities
text:
A BILL FOR AN ACT

RELATING TO STATE LANDS.

BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF HAWAII:

SECTION 1. The legislature finds that the University of Hawaii at West Oʻahu has experienced significant enrollment growth over the past decade...

amendments.diffHtml: The Department of Land and Natural Resources shall The Board of Regents of the University of Hawaii may enter into long-term leases for educational facilities in West Oʻahu.

history.action: Referred to Committee on Higher Education & Technology
